description: Upon meeting Dave, you'll notice he's green and kind.

statement: is(X, young) :- is(X, kind), is(X, green), is(X, round).
description: If you meet a kind green person with a round shape they will also be young.

statement: is(X, big) :- is(X, red), is(X, green).
description: If a person is red and green, then they will present as big.
Bob is big and seems cold, but he's just green.

statement: is(X, red) :- is(X, big), is(X, young).
description: All the big and young boys at the park are red.
